films.englishName: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
films.chineseName: 哈利波特: 神秘的魔法石
films.description: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
